title: You are Jerk
itunes:title: You are Jerk
description:
Today on the show we opened the phone lines to see what our listeners would do if there child's teacher called their child a jerk, after a listeners called up for their segment "Get it Off Your Chest" venting about their child's teacher being innapropriate. Also, we had Coach Gessie, Stephanie Johnson & Dr. Althea Maybank On Heart Health & Blood Pressure Risks and more, and Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to an Arizona Catholic Priest for Wrongly-Wording Baptism.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
